titleStmt.title: My reverend brethren, as I doubt not, but that you well know, and seriously weigh the business and end of your high calling ...
titleStmt.author: Lamplugh, Thomas, 1615-1691.
Church of England. Diocese of Exeter. Bishop (1676-1688 : Lamplugh)

notesStmt.note: Signed in MS. at end: Tho: Exon.
Title from opening words of text.
Wing gives title as: [A pastoral letter to the clergy of the diocese of Exceter about catechisms].
Reproduction of the original in Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library.
